PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-01712009-02-05,  ,  ,  ,  CCRA
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisINDIVIDUAL REMISSION ORDER to JESSICA McKENNA, representing the provincial portion of the harmonized sales tax (HST) she paid on the purchase of a motor vehicle in Nova Scotia which was subsequently shipped to British Columbia. She paid two provincial taxes in respect of the same vehicle.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2009-0008 Publication Date: 2009-02-18
AttachmentsAttachment
